docs.title: CS3 Chemoinformatics Summer School 2024
docs.text: Welcome to the CS3 Chemoinformatics Summer School 2024 website! This platform provides a summary of the topics, presentations, and key insights from the summer school held at the University of Strasbourg, from 24 to 28 June 2024.

docs.title: About the Event
docs.text:
The Strasbourg Summer School in Chemoinformatics is a prestigious annual event gathering experts and students in the field of cheminformatics, focusing on emerging technologies, trends, and research areas.

This year’s summer school covered a wide range of topics, including: - Artificial Intelligence in Chemistry - QSAR Modeling - Big Data Analysis and Visualization - Chemical Reaction Mining - Materials Informatics - In Silico Pharmacology

Explore the lectures, summaries, and presenter profiles below.
